title: Online Message Design Learning Utilizing Mobile Microblogging

context.prior_knowledge: Basic message design principles and experience with online educational tools
context.additional_context: Targeting practicing elementary teachers to improve practical message design skills applicable to their work, emphasizing mobile device-enabled daily learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three message design principles based on real-world cases collected from everyday environments
Learners can analyze, critique peers' cases on mobile microblogging platforms, and incorporate insights into their own designs
Learners can improve their message design work by over 80% by synthesizing peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
